channel.title: Kibana on nyzme
channel.description: Recent content in Kibana on nyzme

item.title: Playing with ELK stack using Docker
item.description: The Goal In here I just want to test how quick it is to setup ELK stack for an application by utilizing Docker. Given the current landspace of Development we are now on the stage that every developer should be utilizing the containerization benefits on their projects. A Quick testing of Elasticsearch and Kibana locally Elasticsearch and Kibana should be on the same network, here we used one for both and exposes the port.
